text: Hello! Bumping into an issue when trying to install the global dependencies for local dev. Seeing this error ```Unhandled rejection Error: EACCES: permission denied, mkdir '/Users/linouye/.npm/_cacache/index-v5/4f/4a'``` followed by ```npm ERR! cb() never called!``` . Have people bumped into this before when trying to set up local dev? Thanks!
I believe I did, I just needed to `sudo` install
yepp that did it. Thanks Ian.
Hi all, I'm just getting my local setup completed for the first time but I cant see a way to test out HubL locally. It just comes through in the browser as hardcoded text. Am I missing something?
I don't believe you can actually run hubl code locally. It needs to go through a HubSpot renderer, which would be up on your sandbox or production accounts.
You can run it locally. Download <https://designers.HubSpot.com/docs/tools/local-hubl-server>
